<<<<<<< HEAD
The apothecaries vindication in answer to an abusive book entitled The family physician and house apothecary.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
s.n., [London? : 1676]
Imprint from Wing. Verse: "Now Machiavels reviv'd, he ..." In answer to Gideon Harvey's The family physician, and the house apothecary. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
